description: This project is product re-selling website. It was developed by React Js using react-router-dom. And a dedicated admin panel in Private routes. User Authentication handle in firebase. Stripe Payment Gateway Method.

This project is developed by React Js using react-router-dom. Here is add service and delete the service. Users can add a review by clicking the details services page. User Authentication handle in firebase. And the client side has been deployed in firebase

This project was developed by React Js using react-router-dom. Using a private route gets a premium course. And dynamic checkout page. Download the course details page as a pdf. Authentication handle in firebase. And the client side has been deployed in firebase.
